ItemType.name: laser collimator
ItemType.description: A laser collimator is an after-market device that sharpens the focus of your laser cannons thereby increasing their damage.

ItemType.name: cannon accelerator
ItemType.description: This device increases the velocity of mass drivers and recoilless cannons. When installed, a ship's kinetic weapons will inflict 50% more damage.

ItemType.name: cargo hold expansion
ItemType.description: This is a pressurized hold that can be attached to a ship to increase the amount of cargo it can carry.

ItemType.name: miners's cargo hold
ItemType.description: Designed for mining ships, this cargo hold has grapples to bring ore on board.

ItemType.name: Nova-25 reactor
ItemType.description: The Nova-25 reactor is a popular upgrade for those ships that need to support advanced weaponry. The reactor has a peak power output of 25MW.

ItemType.name: solar panel array
ItemType.description: A solar panel array converts sunlight into energy usable by a ship's reactor.

ItemType.name: tritium propulsion upgrade
ItemType.description: Most small and medium sized ships use a fusion drive for propulsion. This device upgrade mixes-in a powerful tritium plasma to increase the thrust of the engines.

ItemType.name: particle accelerator
ItemType.description: This compact particle accelerator boosts the damage of any installed particle energy weapon.

ItemType.name: smuggler's cargo hold
ItemType.description: This is a scan-shielded secret cargo hold. The customs inspections of most stations will not detect illegal items when this cargo hold is installed on your ship.

ItemType.name: ICX missile defense turret
ItemType.description: This device combines a fast-doppler sensor with a targeting computer. Hostile missiles in its range are blasted into dust by a laser cannon.

ItemType.name: Nova-50 reactor
ItemType.description: This reactor has a peak power output of 50MW.

ItemType.name: patcher arm
ItemType.description: The patcher arm, manufactured by Honoku-Tomashi, is a robotic arm that attaches to a ship's hull and performs basic repairs on its armor.

ItemType.name: Heisenmachines quantum CPU
ItemType.description: The Heisenmachines Corporation was the first commercial producer of quantum CPUs. Quantum CPUs are necessary for processing the instructions in a mnemonic memory cube.

ItemType.name: Makayev weapon enhancer
ItemType.description: This enhancer increases the damage potential of installed Makayev blast weapons.

ItemType.name: Nova-100 reactor
ItemType.description: With 100MW peak power output, this reactor can power all except the most advanced military weapons and devices.

ItemType.name: high-speed howitzer loader
ItemType.description: This high-speed shell loader increases the fire rate of any installed howitzer.

ItemType.name: patch spider
ItemType.description: This robotic spider crawls along the ship's hull and repairs armor of up to technology level XII. It does not require a device slot.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser weapon enhancer
ItemType.description: This enhancer increases the damage potential of installed Rasiermesser kinetic and blast weapons.

ItemType.name: 150NX reactor
ItemType.description: Though older than the Nova series, the 150NX remains popular in the Commonwealth. It has peak power output of 150MW.

ItemType.name: Titan 440 fusion drive
ItemType.description: The Titan 440 fusion drive is the top-of-the-line commercial starship engine. Its thrust far exceeds that of any other non-military engine.

ItemType.name: Bushido weapon enhancer
ItemType.description: This enhancer increases the damage potential of installed Bushido energy weapons.

ItemType.name: inertialess drive
ItemType.description: This alien stardrive can instantaneously accelerate a ship without regard for mass.

ItemType.name: Longreach I autocannon
ItemType.description: The Longreach is a missile-defense autocannon that fires high-velocity rounds.

ItemType.name: SN2500 reactor
ItemType.description: The SN2500 is a military reactor designed for the advanced Centurion/X heavy gunship. At 250MW peak power, it is the most powerful reactor of its size.

ItemType.name: transpace jumpdrive
ItemType.description: This arcane alien device can open a portal through transpace to teleport a ship to another location, much as stargates do.

ItemType.name: Koshiba-500 reactor
ItemType.description: The 500MW Koshiba reactor is the most powerful fusion reactor in existence.

ItemType.name: Hyperion reactor
ItemType.description: Based on a Ringer design, this is an exotic vacuum reactor rated at 1GW peak power output.

ItemType.name: pteracnium megadrive
ItemType.description: The pteracnium megadrive is a recently developed military starship engine based on Library Link schematics. Like most other military technology, megadrives cannot be used by civilian ships.
